HeroSection.subtitle: Kaliteli, hijyenik, pratik, ekonomik ve çevre dostu kağıt bardak çözümleriyle markanıza değer katın. Ürünlerimiz gıda ile temasa uygundur.
HeroSection.groupCompany: Trend Kağıtçılık Ürünleri, Doğu Karadeniz Toptan Gıda Pazarlama firmasının grup şirketidir.
HeroSection.experience: Sektörde 42 yıllık pazarlama ve 10 yılı aşkın üretim tecrübesiyle, Ankara'da bulunan 16.000 m² modern kapalı tesisimizde, 120'den fazla özverili çalışanımızla hizmet veriyoruz.
HeroSection.production: Son teknoloji makina parkuru ile hijyen ve kalite kurallarını ön planda tutarak müşterilerimize yüksek hacim, kalite ve uygun fiyat sunmaktayız.
HeroSection.brand: EKSTREM CUP markamız altında, Avrupa standartlarına uygun, birçok farklı ölçü ve gramajda, özgün ve size özel tasarım imkanlarıyla sızdırmaz kağıt bardaklar üretiyoruz.

CtaSection.title: Değişime Hazır mısınız?
CtaSection.description: Sürdürülebilir Ekstrem Packaging kağıt bardaklarını seçen işletmelere ve bireylere katılın. Özel bir fiyat teklifi alın veya çevre dostu çözümlerimiz hakkında bugün daha fazla bilgi edinin.

Footer.tagline: Kaliteli, hijyenik ve çevre dostu kağıt ambalaj çözümleri. Markanıza değer katmak için buradayız.

AboutPage.pageDescription: Ekstrem Packaging'in hikayesi, misyonu ve değerleri. Kaliteli ve çevre dostu kağıt ambalaj çözümlerindeki tecrübemizi keşfedin.
AboutPage.title: Hakkımızda
AboutPage.subTitle: Ekstrem Packaging'i Tanıyın

FeaturesSection.subTitle: Why Ekstrem Packaging?
FeaturesSection.advancedInfrastructureDescription: We guarantee high-volume and quality production with our state-of-the-art machinery park and automation systems. Our facility is supported by extensive production and warehousing areas.

peCoating.name: High-Capacity PE Coating
peCoating.description: Monthly production capacity of 3000 tons of polyethylene coating and raw material with 2 machines.

grammageRange.name: Wide Grammage Range
grammageRange.description: Raw material production in every grammage and size between 150 and 350 GSM.

certifiedProduction.name: Certified Production and Standards
certifiedProduction.description: We produce in international norms, compliant with FSC-PEFC certifications and BRC food safety standards.

standardCompatibility.name: Standard Compatibility and Ease of Use
standardCompatibility.description: Ekstrem Cup products are compatible with all standard lids on the market. Offers leak-proof, hygienic, and practical use.

wideProductRange.title: Wide Product Range
wideProductRange.description: Producing different size and weighted paper cups from 2.5 oz to 16 oz.

automationEfficiency.title: Automation and Efficiency
automationEfficiency.description: Automatic counting-packing-boxing and plastic stretching capability.

highProductionCapacity.title: High Production Capacity
highProductionCapacity.description: Almost 8 million cups per day capacity with 75+ paper cup machines.

modernFacility.title: Modern Facility Infrastructure
modernFacility.description: Our total 16,000 m² factory area consists of a 4,000 m² production section and a 12,000 m² warehousing section.

FeaturesSection.imageAltProductionLine: Ekstrem Packaging Factory Production Line and Machine Detail

ProductsPreviewSection.subTitle: Discover Our Wide Product Range
ProductsPreviewSection.description: We offer quality and eco-friendly packaging for all your needs, from paper cups to bowls, plates to custom solutions.

cups.name: Paper Cups
cups.description: Eco-friendly paper cups in various sizes, ideal for coffee, tea, and cold beverages.

bowls.name: Paper Bowls
bowls.description: Practical and stylish paper bowls for ice cream, soup, noodles, and other foods.

plates.name: Paper Plates
plates.description: Natural and durable paper plates in different sizes, suitable for all kinds of meals.

QualityAndSustainabilitySection.subTitle: Our Sustainability and Standards
QualityAndSustainabilitySection.intro: We are committed to providing our customers with the highest quality, safe, and environmentally friendly products. Our production processes are supported by internationally recognized standards and certifications.
QualityAndSustainabilitySection.certificationsIntro: Our quality and reliability standards are registered with internationally valid certifications.

hygienic.title: Hygienic and Food Safe
hygienic.description: Our Ekstrem Cup products are hygienic, practical, and economical solutions that are perfectly safe for contact with food.

leakProof.title: High Quality and Leak-Proof
leakProof.description: Our products are made with high-quality materials and are guaranteed to be leak-proof, offering a reliable user experience.

ecoFriendly.title: Environmentally Friendly Production
ecoFriendly.description: Ekstrem Cup is produced according to standards that do not harm the environment. We are working towards a sustainable future.

fsc.name: FSC-PEFC Certified
fsc.description: We use FSC and PEFC certified materials, promoting responsible use of forest resources.

brc.name: BRC Standard Production
brc.description: We manufacture under food safety management systems compliant with BRC Global Standards.

ExportMapSection.subTitle: Worldwide Export
ExportMapSection.description: We deliver our products to customers all over the world, representing our quality in the international arena.
ExportMapSection.mapNote: Countries marked with ● on the map are the main regions we export to.
